descriptionHtml:
Armor ported over from DA2
http://www.dragonagenexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3100

SilverX10

==================================================================================
This Armor is based on my TB02 body variant.
There will be no support for anyone else\'s bodies.
Why? Because too many variants cheapens the armor. And it is too good to make it as common as crabs in \"The Bloomin Rose\".

Of course, anyone is welcome to import and use jojjo\'s armor from Oblivion.
In fact importing his FULL armor would be a good mod to build.

12/01/2012 UPDATE:

Removed headpeices from heavy armor.
Added glowmap.
Fixed bug of hand gap if wearing SilverX gloves while nude.
Altered heavy, medium, light armor variants.
Filename changes.
*** You will need to uninstall older versions ***
===============================================================

This mod replaces the imperial armor. (Red & Black) and the Gold and Ruby Circlet.
The imperial armor comes in 3 variants.
Heavy = Full Kit.
Medium = Less Armor.
Light = Lesser Armor.

Optional Colors have been posted as seperate file.
Replace the Red & Black textures with the optional files.

Installation:
=============
Extract and add the files to your override directory.

Ingame wear the Imperial Armor/S to see the effect.

================================================================

You can use the console to get the armors and circlet if you dont have them.

000166FD Gold and Ruby Circlet
00013ED8 Studded Imperial Armor
00013ED9 Imperial Light Armor
000136D5 Imperial Armor

Example type:

player.additem 00013ed8 1

http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Item_Codes_%28Skyrim%29

================================================================

Credits:
========
Special thanks to:
2pac4eva7
phygit
aremeta
jojjo
apachii
ryanhabs
Anyone else I may have forgot to mention.

=================================================================
author: Thor
